__e: You didn't know the victim, did you? -No.
As far as I'm aware you're the only person who knew the victim here in Athens.
Did your father say he knew the family before he left here?
He said he knew the girl and her family a long time.
I knew most of them, but this was the first body I ever saw.
How well did you know my brother?
Someone who knew the apartment well and could find the main switch in a few seconds.
But this guy, he hadn't done his homework.
Maybe you knew the girl well...
So you didn't know the girl too well?
Are you sure it wasn't someone who knew the house?
- Didn't you know him very well?
Are you sure it wasn't someone who knew the house?
What do you know about him that somebody who knew him well here doesn't know?
- Perhaps you didn't know my father?
- Then did you know my father?
How can you be sure the victim knew the murderer?
You had the evidence and the murderer, I believe you said.
- I think she knew the murderer.
My dear, why didn't you mention the doctor?
I didn't know about "fear" before, but I do now.
Well, this woman came in who had met the brother but didn't know where the brother was.
I bumped into this fella who said he knew a bloke who could help us.
- I didn't know you a year ago.
Before, I didn't know men, but I was afraid of them
So, you knew the names of British agents all over the world?
You didn't even know them? Well, they've only been there for three days.
I may have done something wrong but I didn't know you then.
Well, there was this one guy who said that he knew her, and he went to a party with her, and... she, uh...
